title: Journalists Arrested at Occupy Events Nationwide : compiled by Josh Stearns
name: Journalists Arrested at Occupy Events Nationwide : compiled by Josh Stearns
description:
Josh Stearns has been tracking journalist arrests at Occupy events around the U.S. since September, 2011. 

Please send tips to me on Twitter @jcstearns or via email at jstearns [at] freepress [dot] net.

This map is only a summary. For background, source material, links, videos and more visit my full list of journalist arrests on Storify: http://bit.ly/journarrest or check out this spreadsheet: http://bit.ly/arrestlist

https://docs.google.com/spreadsheet/pub?hl=en_US&hl=en_US&key=0AqRq1hdSmsX3dGhIenNHRkt0czg5NUFMbUhmUktuQ1E&single=true&gid=0&output=html
http://maps.google.com/maps/ms?msid=206048931241702581094.0004b3ac9ff0c9c0da722&msa=0
